home.biography: I am a full-stack software developer currently nearing the completion of my Bachelor's degree in Information Systems at the Federal University of Santa Maria (UFSM). My area of specialization focuses on Distributed Systems, Parallel Computing, and Concurrent Computing, with an emphasis on theoretical foundations. On my blog, I share insights and experiences gained throughout my studies and practical work, as well as compile references and bookmarks that enrich my knowledge in these fields.

metadata.description: This blog is about my journey as a Software Developer. Here do you find my thoughts, ideas, and experiences. I hope you enjoy it.
